>
[Extend Elixir](/Feats.aspx?ID=113) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 79 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Integrating your own personal energy into the elixirs you create causes them to affect you for longer. When you consume one of your alchemical items that has the [elixir](/Traits.aspx?ID=59) and [infused](/Traits.aspx?ID=94) traits and a duration of 1 minute or longer, that elixir’s duration is doubled.

<title level="2">Extend Elixir leads to...</title>
[Eternal Elixir](/Feats.aspx?ID=119), [Persistent Mutagen](/Feats.aspx?ID=122)
name: Extend Elixir
